[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    While(
        WhileStatement {
            while: Span(
                3,
                1,
            ),
            condition: Parenthesized {
                left_parenthesis: Span(
                    3,
                    7,
                ),
                inner: Variable(
                    SimpleVariable(
                        SimpleVariable {
                            span: Span(
                                3,
                                8,
                            ),
                            name: "$foo",
                        },
                    ),
                ),
                right_parenthesis: Span(
                    3,
                    12,
                ),
            },
            body: Statement(
                Noop(
                    Span(
                        3,
                        13,
                    ),
                ),
            ),
        },
    ),
]
